channel.title: ZomG how do i work himachi?
channel.description: seriously...i need help with hamachi cus i cant figure out how to work it :mad: so please any 1 who can help me please post!

item.title: ZomG how do i work himachi?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

Kitno:

Well then youre typing it wrong (Capitalization with name and pass) or the people who posted it lied.

as he stated… hamachi is case sensitive so if the title of the sevrer your trying to join is say

YayScape10

and you put

yayscape10 it wont work it must be capatalized the same and all of that including on the password

Read full topic

item.title: ZomG how do i work himachi?
item.dc:creator: @slayer666 slayer666
item.description:
@slayer666 wrote:

i know that…on the posts advertising himachi servers it has a list of the networks such as

blankscape
blankscape1…and so on.

and it also has the pass on the same page (which i enter correctly)

cmon kitno lol ive seen u help out plenty of other threads. and i hope u know the answer to this one

item.title: ZomG how do i work himachi?
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

If youre creating one you have to click “Create” not “Join”. Join is for people joining an existing network.

Read full topic
item.source: ZomG how do i work himachi?

item.title: ZomG how do i work himachi?
item.dc:creator: @slayer666 slayer666
item.description:
@slayer666 wrote:

the problem im having is…when i open hamachi it logs on and everything and when i click on the triangle thingy (create or join networks) and put in the network name (example: yayscape [not a real server, to my knowledge]) and then enter the pass a little bubble comes up and says “server does not exist!”

Read full topic
item.source: ZomG how do i work himachi?

item.title: ZomG how do i work himachi?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

you have to edit your firewall exclusions to make it so people can access your server through hamachi… so you need to open your firewall go to exclusions add your port and things in it and then click add or ok then you need to set the blocks on hamachi to only allow access through the 43594 or 5555 port witchever your server is… then you need to go to the like triangle looking thing down in the bottom right corner create the rooms i guess is what you might call them for your server and it should work

Read full topic
